column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////As a person coming from out of state
column2: this cannot be "the" place to get a deep dish. Perhaps the shops expanded too quickly
column3: cause the food was mediocre. I've had better deep dish outside Chicago. It was an average deep dish pie with above average pricing. Not worth the wait
column4: nor the hype. Service was ok. I'd go somewhere else.
